nodes.text: The PH-STAP, Phantom Single Trooper Aerial Platform, is a repulsorlift vehicle used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems.

The Phantom is a Confederacy of Independent Systems Single Trooper Aerial Platform. Compared to the regular STAP, it has a wider trunk and can carry a larger energy cell. A sensor dish is at the front, and it carries a pair of blaster cannons. It is made of a lightweight alloy, allowing it to strike swiftly and with agility. It features a repulsorlift and can reach speeds of 650 k/h. It is piloted by one droid, which also acts as the gunner, although it is vulnerable.
A BX-series droid commando used one during Battle for the Stolen Crystals against Commander Gree's Desert Speeder.
The PH-STAP appears in the 2013 comic/LEGO set LEGO Star Wars Brickmaster: Battle for the Stolen Crystals.
